data.title: Live Drawing with Frank Miller
data.meta_description: Frank Miller is well known for pushing the boundaries, exploring to the furthest reaches of creativity, then exploring even further. This is why he loved Sin City, which he created 30 years ago, and…
data.text:
Frank Miller is well known for pushing the boundaries, exploring to the furthest reaches of creativity, then exploring even further. This is why he loved Sin City, which he created 30 years ago, and this is why he has taken a leap into the NFT space with Gala Labs and Concept Art House.

As Mr. Miller said recently in an exclusive interview with Gala Games’ Jason Brink, there are “new worlds to explore and new toys to create.” Frank’s creative edge has only grown sharper throughout his career, and like any creative genius, he seeks expansion into new realms to astound and drive people in brave new ways. He is truly a remarkable man.

Take a few minutes and watch this full video interview; you’ll see and hear it for yourself.

New Territory

In perhaps the most amazing and mysterious piece being auctioned in the Sin City 30th Anniversary series, Frank Miller is really going there, pushing the limits as he always has done, even in an art form as new as NFTs.

“LIVE DRAWING WITH FRANK MILLER”

Available for a limited time only at FrankMiller.io.

This 1 of 1 auction is live on Opensea at THIS LINK until October 11th at 5pm PST. The lucky winner will receive a prize that does not yet exist. They will win a personalized live drawing by Frank Miller himself, immortalized into an NFT. Not only will the receive the final NFT created in the process, but they will also receive the video of its creation.

As the winner of this unique piece, you can call the shots. The Gala Labs team will reach out to you following the auction, and you will initiate the creative process. The artist is flexible and willing to make something extremely special just for you. Are you brave enough to go for it?

The winner of this auction will own something incredible, something that they will treasure for the rest of their life, and something unlike anything else that exists anywhere in the world.

The uniqueness, the exclusivity, and the individuality of this not-yet-existent piece of NFT art makes it one of the rarest collectible gems in the world… an NFT collector’s dream.

Join Gala Labs, Concept Art House, and of course, the legendary Frank Miller in becoming part of NFT history, as together we all “widen the creative possibilities for artists and storytellers to explore.”
